project_abstract.cdata: The project components are: (a) credit and technical services for on-farm development of about 1,800 small (5-10 acres) and 600 larger (40-50 acres) dairy farms in the Coconut Triangle and Mid-Country of the Wet Zone, including purchase of about 10,400 local and 3,200 imported heifers; (b) credit to NMB for supply and installation of equipment for the expansion and improvement of existing milk collection and transport services of NMB; (c) credit to MPCS and DCS for construction or improvement of facilities to house milk collection equipment; (d) establishment of pilot units to demonstrate (i) systems of communal calf-rearing, and (ii) techniques for increasing milk production in the Dry Zone; and (e) establishment of a Project Technical Unit.
